name: KOLZ
description: KOLZ is transforming how you connect with the crypto world by bringing digital replicas of top Web3 influencers directly to you. Powered by Sensay’s cutting-edge AI and blockchain technology, KOLZ enables Key Opinion Leaders to create digital versions of themselves, providing access to exclusive insights, strategies, and knowledge. Built on the Ethereum network, KOLZ leverages its own token—$KOLZ—for seamless transactions and incentivizes influencer participation through token allocation.
